DOC.brief_summary: 1. Evaluation of the efficacy of the circumferential versus non circumferential distribution of mepivacaine around the median and ulnar nerves. 2. Evaluation the onset of action of mepivacaine in circumferential versus non circumferential distribution around the median and ulnar nerves. 3. Spread of mepivacaine after injection guided by ultrasonography. 4. Complications of both anesthetic techniques in postoperative time.
DOC.brief_title: Distribution Circumferential Versus Non Circumferential of Mepivacaine in the Median and Ulnar Nerves
DOC.criteria: Scheduled patients for surgery of carpal tunnel including patients in ASA IIII status, without exclusion criteria. The principal investigator study and/or other designated site staff will obtain written informed consent from all research patients.
